PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-13802010-11-04,  ,  NRCAN,  ,  , 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectAmending Order AO-1-EC-III-9 (Variance of National Energy Board Certificate EC-III-9)
PrecisOrder amending the Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity No. EC-III-9, issued to The MANITOBA HYDRO ELECTRIC BOARD (MANITOBA HYDRO), to reflect the inclusion of and continuing operation of the Letellier Station as part of the international power line (IPL) system.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Amending Order AO-1-EC-III-9 (Variance of National Energy Board Certificate EC-III-9)
precis: Order amending the Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity No. EC-III-9, issued to The MANITOBA HYDRO ELECTRIC BOARD (MANITOBA HYDRO), to reflect the inclusion of and continuing operation of the Letellier Station as part of the international power line (IPL) system.
